description: Provides information about a configuration policy. Only the Security Hub delegated administrator can invoke this operation from the home Region.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or universally unique identifier (UUID) of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The UUID of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the configuration policy.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy was last updated.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy was created.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationPolicy
nested_items.description: An object that defines how Security Hub is configured. It includes whether Security Hub is enabled or disabled, a list of enabled security standards, a list of enabled or disabled security controls, and a list of custom parameter values for specified controls. If the policy includes a list of security controls that are enabled, Security Hub disables all other controls (including newly released controls). If the policy includes a list of security controls that are disabled, Security Hub enables all other controls (including newly released controls).

nested_items.name: SecurityHub
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service that the configuration policy applies to.

nested_items.name: ServiceEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether Security Hub is enabled in the policy.

nested_items.name: EnabledStandardIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A list that defines which security standards are enabled in the configuration policy.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityControlsConfiguration
nested_items.description: An object that defines which security controls are enabled in the configuration policy. The enablement status of a control is aligned across all of the enabled standards in an account.

nested_items.name: EnabledSecurityControlIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A list of security controls that are enabled in the configuration policy. Security Hub disables all other controls (including newly released controls) other than the listed controls.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DisabledSecurityControlIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A list of security controls that are disabled in the configuration policy. Security Hub enables all other controls (including newly released controls) other than the listed controls.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityControlCustomParameters
nested_items.description: A list of security controls and control parameter values that are included in a configuration policy.

nested_items.name: SecurityControlId
nested_items.description: The ID of the security control.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: An object that specifies parameter values for a control in a configuration policy.

nested_items.name: ValueType
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: ValueType
nested_items.description: Identifies whether a control parameter uses a custom user-defined value or subscribes to the default Security Hub behavior.

nested_items.name: Integer
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is an integer.

nested_items.name: IntegerList
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a list of integers.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: Double
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a double.

nested_items.name: String
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a string.

nested_items.name: StringList
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a list of strings.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Boolean
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a boolean.

nested_items.name: Enum
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is an enum.

nested_items.name: EnumList
nested_items.description: A control parameter that is a list of enums.
(string) ---
